src:
Siap-siap! Bulan Depan Transfer OVO ke Bank Tak Lagi Gratis
03 Nov 2019, 01:31 by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Foto: ovo

Jakarta - Bagi pengguna layanan dompet elektronik milik Lippo Group, OVO harus siap-siap. Pasalnya pada 12 Desember mendatang transfer ke bank melalui OVO akan dikenakan biaya transfer.Selama ini, pengguna layanan OVO belum dikenakan biaya saat melakukan transfer.Memang sih, biayanya nggak sebesar biaya transfer melalui bank. Berikut berita selengkapnya: (kil/zlf)
text:
Getting ready! Next Month OVO Transfers to Banks will no longer be free
Nov 3, 2019, 01:31 by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Photo: ovo

Jakarta - For users of Lippo Group's electronic wallet service, OVO must be prepared. Because on December 12 next transfer to a bank via OVO will be subject to a transfer fee. During this time, users of the OVO service have not been charged when transferring. Here is the complete news: (kil / zlf)
